### Tender Description

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) invites tenders, through a two-phase invitation process, for the Supply and Installation of Mechanical Systems. The project involves a renovation and new addition on an existing building at Mission Minimum Institution. Bidders must submit a bid in two phases.

**Phase One:**

* Bidders must submit bids according to the selection procedure described in Phase One.
* Bidders will only have to submit the Phase One documents included in the ITT.
* The CSC will assess Bidders’ qualifications and experience to determine which bids are responsive.

**Phase Two:**

* The CSC will invite Bidders who submitted responsive bids for Phase One to submit a bid for Phase Two.
* Responsive Bidders will have to submit the Phase Two documents included in the ITT as part of Phase Two.

### Conditions of Participation

* No conditions for participation of suppliers not specified in solicitation documentation.

### Estimated Quantity of Commodity

* See solicitation document statement of work and basis of payment.

### Duration of Contract and Time Frame for Delivery

* Construction Time:
	+ The Contractor must perform and complete the Work within twenty-five (25) weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.
